verses.verse: Put <WG5279> them <WG846> in mind <WG5279> to be in subjection to <WG5293> rulers <WG746>, to <WG2532> authorities <WG1849>, to be obedient <WG3980>, to be <WG1511> ready <WG2092> unto <WG4314> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>,
to speak evil <WG987> of no man <WG3367>, not to be <WG1511> contentious <WG269>, to be gentle <WG1933>, showing <WG1731> all <WG3956> meekness <WG4236> toward <WG4314> all <WG3956> men <WG444>.

For <WG1063> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> once <WG4218> were <WG1510> foolish <WG453>, disobedient <WG545>, deceived <WG4105>, serving <WG1398> divers <WG4164> lusts <WG1939> and <WG2532> pleasures <WG2237>, living <WG1236> in <WG1722> malice <WG2549> and <WG2532> envy <WG5355>, hateful <WG4767>, hating <WG3404> one another <WG240>.
But <WG1161> when <WG3753> the kindness <WG5544> of God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>, and <WG2532> his love <WG5363> toward man <WG5363>, appeared <WG2014>,

not <WG3756> by <WG1537> works <WG2041> done in <WG1722> righteousness <WG1343>, which <WG3739> we <WG2249> did <WG4160> ourselves <WG235>, but according to <WG2596> his <WG846> mercy <WG1656> he saved <WG4982> us <WG2248>, through <WG1223> the washing <WG3067> of regeneration <WG3824> and <WG2532> renewing <WG342> of the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>,
which <WG3739> he poured <WG1632> out upon <WG1909> us <WG2248> richly <WG4146>, through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>;
that <WG2443>, being justified <WG1344> by his <WG1565> grace <WG5485>, we might be made <WG1096> heirs <WG2818> according to <WG2596> the hope <WG1680> of eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.

Faithful <WG4103> is the saying <WG3056>, and <WG2532> concerning these things <WG5130> I desire <WG1014> that <WG1226> thou <WG4571> affirm confidently <WG1226>, to the end that <WG2443> they who have believed <WG4100> God <WG2316> may be careful <WG5431> to maintain <WG4291> good <WG2570> works <WG2041>. These things <WG5023> are <WG2076> good <WG2570> and <WG2532> profitable <WG5624> unto men <WG444>:

but <WG1161> shun <WG4026> foolish <WG3474> questionings <WG2214>, and <WG2532> genealogies <WG1076>, and <WG2532> strifes <WG2054>, and <WG2532> fightings <WG3163> about law <WG3544>; for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> unprofitable <WG512> and <WG2532> vain <WG3152>.
A factious <WG141> man <WG444> after <WG3326> a first <WG1520> and <WG2532> second <WG1208> admonition <WG3559> refuse <WG3868>;
knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> such <WG5108> a one is perverted <WG1612>, and <WG2532> sinneth <WG264>, being <WG5607> self-condemned <WG843>.

When <WG3752> I shall send <WG3992> Artemas <WG734> unto <WG4314> thee <WG4571>, or <WG2228> Tychicus <WG5190>, give diligence <WG4704> to come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165> to <WG1519> Nicopolis <WG3533>: for <WG1063> there <WG1563> I have determined <WG2919> to winter <WG3914>.

Set forward <WG4311> Zenas <WG2211> the lawyer <WG3544> and <WG2532> Apollos <WG625> on their journey <WG4311> diligently <WG4709>, that <WG2443> nothing <WG3367> be wanting <WG3007> unto them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> let <WG3129> our people <WG2251> also <WG2532> learn <WG3129> to maintain <WG4291> good <WG2570> works <WG2041> for <WG1519> necessary <WG316> uses <WG5532>, that <WG2443> they be <WG5600> not <WG3361> unfruitful <WG175>.

All that are <WG3956> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> salute <WG782> thee <WG4571>. Salute <WG782> them that love <WG5368> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>. Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>.
